articles.title: South African medical schemes to fund COVID-19 vaccines for 30% of adults - Reuters UK
articles.description: Millions of South Africans will have their COVID-19 vaccinations subsidised by medical schemes that pool health insurance premiums through an agreement with the government, a top medical scheme administrator said.
